modules.name: Analysis 1
modules.description: Covers fundamental concepts of mathematical analysis, including limits, continuity, differentiation, and integration.

modules.name: Algebra 1
modules.description: Focuses on linear algebra and fundamental algebraic structures, including matrices, determinants, and vector spaces.

modules.name: Data Structures and Algorithms 1
modules.description: Introduces fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, along with basic algorithmic techniques.

modules.name: Machine Structure 1
modules.description: Covers the basics of computer architecture, including binary representation, logic gates, and assembly language concepts.

modules.name: Electronics and System Components
modules.description: Explores fundamental electronic components and circuits, including resistors, capacitors, transistors, and their applications.

modules.name: English
modules.description: Enhances English language skills, focusing on academic writing, reading comprehension, and oral communication.

modules.name: Scientific Terminology
modules.description: Introduces essential scientific and technical terms used across various engineering and computer science disciplines.

modules.name: Analysis 2
modules.description: Continuation of Analysis 1, covering sequences, series, and multivariable calculus concepts.

modules.name: Algebra 2
modules.description: Expands on Algebra 1 topics, introducing abstract algebra, linear transformations, and eigenvalues.

modules.name: Data Structures and Algorithms 2
modules.description: Explores advanced data structures like trees, graphs, and hashing, along with more complex algorithmic techniques.

modules.name: Machine Structure 2
modules.description: Continues Machine Structure 1, focusing on microprocessors, memory management, and system performance.

modules.name: Probability and Statistics 1
modules.description: Introduces fundamental probability theory, statistical methods, and data analysis techniques.

modules.name: Mathematical Tools for Programming
modules.description: Covers essential mathematical techniques for computer science, including discrete mathematics and logic.

modules.name: Information and Communication Technology
modules.description: Explores modern ICT concepts, including networking, cloud computing, and digital communication technologies.
